translations: 威胁，恐吓（intimidate 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: Women can come in here and not feel intimidated.
sentences.translation: 女人们可以进到这里而不会感觉害怕。

sentences.sentence: Deta was not easily intimidated, and said: "I am sorry, but I thought this child would suit you."
sentences.translation: 迪蒂并不容易被吓倒，她说：“很抱歉，但我觉得这个孩子就是你们想要的类型。”

sentences.sentence: She's not intimidated at all and she criticizes me in exactly the same way she did when I was first unpublished and I was starting.
sentences.translation: 她一点也不害怕，她批评我的方式和我刚出书的时候一模一样。
